alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 06 at 2:25PM MDT until July 06 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Wyoming, including the following county, Johnson. * WHEN...Until 430 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 224 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor street flooding has been reported in the city of Buffalo. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Buffalo, Johnson County Fairgrounds and Buffalo Johnson County Airport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
